channel.title: PI adding an Banking All button
channel.description:
Well tbh i'm really new into the Client Coding of rsps's
now i want to add an banking all items button in my client and i searched for some tuts.
i used this tut [url=http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/snippets/569332-pi-deposit-all-bank-interface-fixed-some-clients.html]http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/snippets/569332-pi-deposit-all-bank-interface-fixed-some-clients.html[/url]
The problem now is when i click on a bank my client freezes.
somebody got some tips or maybe some advice what i can try

item.title: PI adding an Banking All button
item.dc:creator: @runeball runeball
item.description:
@runeball wrote:

i followed onther tuts first but they gave me errors but these errors are fixed on the code on this TUT (i putted the link in above) but now just my screen freezes when i open the bank

Read full topic
item.source: PI adding an Banking All button

item.title: PI adding an Banking All button
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

runescape sucks:

If you have problems with the tutorials, post the errors here.

I would actually argue that if he’s following a tutorial on another site, to ask on that site instead. But, we’ll try to help.

Read full topic
